member.name: T:Lab_2_Semester_Average.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Lab_2_Semester_Average.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Lab_2_Semester_Average.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.InputValidation(System.String)
member.summary: Function used to validate user input for the grade of the course

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.DetermineLetterGrade(System.Double)
member.summary: Function that is used to determine letter grade based on numeric grade parameter based on the provided chart

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.TextBoxes_Leave(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for all text boxes that validates user input for the grade of the course, determines a letter grade and displays it in the label next to the text box. This event handler is executed when the focus is moved from the text box.

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.frmSemesterAverage_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Load event of the frmSemesterAverage form that adds TextBoxes_Leave handler to all the text boxes as soon as the form loads

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.btnCalculate_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Click event of the btnCalculate button that checks if the grades have been entered for all text boxes, then calculates semester average, displays the letter grade of the semester, disables text boxes and the Calculate button

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.resetForm
member.summary: Subroutine that is used to reset the form (clear text boxes and output labels, enable all text boxes and the btnCalculate button)

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.btnReset_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Click event of the Reset button that resets the form using the subroutine

member.name: M:Lab_2_Semester_Average.frmSemesterAverage.btnExit_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Click event of the Exit button that exits the form
